item.title: Can't kill out of safe zones? :|
item.dc:creator: @J112 J
item.description:
@J112 wrote:

Well, this is what my nonWild boolean looks like.

public boolean nonWild() {
if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >=3250  && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419  && absY <=3423 ) || (absX >=2762  && absX <=2977  && absY >=2765   && absY <=2974 ) ||  (absX >=2759  && absX <=2766  && absY >=2770   && absY <=2764 ) ||  (absX >3070  && absX <=3279  && absY >=3108  && absY <=3239 ) ||
heightLevel == 0)
return true;
else
return false;

Then I try to go somewhere like 9999,9999 and try to attack someone and it doesn’t work. How come?

Read full topic
